title: Did the Obama administration grant citizenship to 2,500 Iranians during nuclear transaction negotiations?
subtitle: We found no evidence that the Obama Administration granted preferential treatment to the more than 23,000 persons born in Iran who had acquired citizenship or permanent legal status in 2015.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Obama Administration has granted 2,500 Iranians citizenship as part of the nuclear transaction negotiations.
